definition: to come to have or undergo a change of physical features and attributes
details:
verb
- to come to have or undergo a change of physical features and attributes
= example: to come to have or undergo a change of physical features and attributes
= synonyms: get
- to take on a certain form, attribute, or aspect
= example: to take on a certain form, attribute, or aspect
= synonyms: take
- to gain through experience
= example: to gain through experience
= synonyms: develop
- to come into the possession of something concrete or abstract
= example: to come into the possession of something concrete or abstract
= synonyms: get
- to win something through one's efforts
= example: to win something through one's efforts
= synonyms: gain
- to locate a moving entity by means of a tracking system such as radar
= example: to locate a moving entity by means of a tracking system such as radar
